page.title: 01PRINCIPAL FEATURES.
page.content: THIS IS AN AREA OF GREAT ISOLATION IT IS OFTEN REFERRED TO AS {"THE LAST {GREAT WILDERNESS IN BRITAIN".}THIS WAS MADE GREAT PLAY OF IN THE PRESS LAST YEAR WHEN THE 56,000 ACRE ESTATE WAS FOR SALE. THE ONLY MEANS OF ACCESS IS BY SEA FROM MALLAIG (7 MILES) OR BY WALKING TRACK FROM LOCH HOURN(15 MILES) THE AREA IS A VERY LARGE BAY BACKED BY A NARROW STRIP OF LOWLAND AND MOUNTAINS UP TO 2000 FEET.THE LOWLAND IS WOODED AND CROSSED BY A SINGLE TRACK ROAD.THE UPLAND IS HEATHER AND BRACKEN.THE LAND IS DRAINED BY THE INVERIE RIVER WHICH IS AN EXCELLENT TROUT FISHING RIVER. THE AREA HAS THREE LARGE SHOOTING LODGES,GLASCHOILLE,SCOTTAS AND INVERIE HOUSE.
